short_summary: Repair of the limestone envelope and replacement of doors and frames
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EDT on March 15, 2023. All bids submitted after 2 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. PWGSC, on behalf of of the Natural Resources Canada is issuing this request for quote for construction work aimed at the partial repair of the limestone envelope as well as the replacement of sets of doors and frames of the Laurentian Forestry Center located at 1055 Rue du Peps, Quebec. All details related are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
=====================================

**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

**Reference Number**: WS3845062928-Doc3845378278
**Amendment Number**: 5
**Publication Date**: February 1, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: March 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
**Expected Contract Start Date**: Not Specified
**Expected Contract End Date**: January 26, 2023

**Project Overview**
--------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the partial repair of the limestone envelope and replacement of door sets and frames at the Laurentian Forestry Center in Quebec City.

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

Not applicable.

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Notice Type: Request for Proposal
*   Regions of Delivery: Quebec
*   Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contract Information**
-------------------------

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contact Person: Gabriel Fortin-Harvey
*   Contact Email: <gabriel.fortin-harvey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   Contact Phone: Not specified
*   Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15291290?extsite=MTUyOTEyOTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

**Attachments**
----------------

None.
